name: Binding
description: Represents an Office.js binding that is defined in the workbook.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: type
properties.description: Returns the type of the binding.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Returns the range represented by the binding. Will throw an error if binding is not of the correct type.

methods.name: getTable
methods.description: Returns the table represented by the binding. Will throw an error if binding is not of the correct type.

methods.name: getText
methods.description: Returns the text represented by the binding. Will throw an error if binding is not of the correct type.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
